name: dissembler
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who hides their real feelings or intentions, or hides the true facts: His opponents put out television commercials portraying him as a dissembler, who will say anything for a vote. He was a brilliant forger and a brilliant dissembler. Related word
dissemble
More examplesFewer examplesHe plays a compulsive dissembler who has deceived four women over a number of years. He was a born politician, a natural dissembler.He is no dissembler, as straight-talking as they come.Internet dating has been a gift to the dissembler.We live in a country led by liars and dissemblers.
